text: Ma-Arab a lehoatateng a re: “Re’a kholoa.” E re: “Ha le na tumelo; le mpa le re “Re inehetse Islamong,” hobane tumelo ha es’o finyelle lipelong tsa lona. Hobane haeba le mamela Allah le Moromuoa oa Hae, Allah A ke ke A le qhekella meputsong ea liketso tsa lona. Hobane Allah U Ts’oarela joalo-joalo, U Tletse Mohau
